meanings.definition: A chemical compound derived from carbamic acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of carbamyl in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Carbamyl is commonly used in the production of fertilizers.
meanings.sent3: The carbamyl molecule threw a party for all the other molecules in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the carbamyl compound looked like a tiny city.
meanings.sent5: The smell of carbamyl filled the room, reminding everyone of the chemistry lesson.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to carbamyl compounds.
meanings.sent1: The carbamyl reaction was crucial for the experiment's success.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the carbamyl properties of different substances.
meanings.sent3: The carbamyl group at the party was the life of the chemical gathering.
meanings.sent4: The carbamyl essence in the air made everything feel more scientific.
meanings.sent5: The carbamyl characteristics of the substance were evident under the microscope.
